item.description:
Okay, so let's have another reading before fall rolls in and banishes us from the great outdoors.  Let us each bring something from Shakespeare...something we love and would like to share with the group: a sonnet, an excerpt from a tragedy or comedy, or something inspired by that immense canon. The possibilities are intimidating... but try to avoid anything that rings too familiar.

You will have up to five minutes to contribute. You may chose to participate or to simply listen. If possible, let us know in advance what you are planning to bring, and if you can, bring copies of the piece to share with the group (it makes it easier to follow).

group.name: Classic Books: Book Club for Die-hard Readers

item.name: A Shakespeare Reading
